response.title: Om Chanting
response.meaning: The primordial sound, representing the essence of reality
response.pronunciation_guide: Pronounce as AUM with three syllables: A-U-M

response.title: Gayatri Mantra
response.meaning: Prayer to the divine light for illumination of the intellect
response.lyrics: Om Bhur Bhuvaḥ Swaḥ, Tat Savitur Vareṇyaṃ, Bhargo Devasya Dhīmahi, Dhiyo Yo Naḥ Prachodayāt
response.transliteration: Om Bhur Bhuvah Svah, Tat Savitur Varenyam, Bhargo Devasya Dhimahi, Dhiyo Yo Nah Prachodayat
response.pronunciation_guide: Recite slowly with focus on each syllable

response.title: Shanti Mantra
response.meaning: May there be peace in all three realms

response.title: Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra
response.lyrics: Om Tryambakam Yajamahe Sugandhim Pushtivardhanam, Urvarukamiva Bandhanan Mrityor Mukshiya Maamritat
response.transliteration: Om Tryambakam Yajamahe Sugandhim Pushtivardhanam, Urvarukamiva Bandhanan Mrityor Mukshiya Maamritat
response.pronunciation_guide: Chant with devotion and clear pronunciation

response.title: So Hum Mantra
response.meaning: I am That - unity with the divine
response.pronunciation_guide: Inhale on So, exhale on Hum

response.comment: Excellent meditation session! Very calming and relaxing.
Great body scan, helped me release tension.
Beautiful loving kindness practice. Very heart-opening.
Helpful for concentration, though could be longer.
Excellent meditation session! Very calming and relaxing.
Good, but could be longer. Still very helpful.
Perfect morning routine! Energized me for the day.
Challenging but rewarding power yoga session.
So relaxing before bed. Helped me sleep better.
Perfect morning routine! Energized me for the day.
Very peaceful and centering. Perfect for beginners.
Powerful and enlightening mantra. Improves focus.
Very peaceful and centering. Perfect for beginners.
